languages.text: An ally under the effect of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Ally under the wielder`s Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally

An ally under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! ability gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

An ally under the effect of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

An ally under the effect of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

languages.text: 受装备者冲破防线！{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响的盟友获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，该名盟友身边每有一名敌人，就会获得+1偏转。
languages.original_text: An ally under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

traits.locale_text: 受装备者冲破防线！能力{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响的盟友获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，该名盟友身边每有一名敌人，就会获得+1偏转。

languages.text: 着用者の階級を崩せ！の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}の下にある味方は、その味方に隣接するそれぞれの敵について、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}に+1の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: An ally under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

traits.locale_text: 着用者の戦線を突破せよ！のアビリティの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}下にある味方は、その味方に隣接するそれぞれの敵について、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}に＋1の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Los aliados bajo el efecto de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} ¡Romped sus filas! del portador ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +1 a su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por cada enemigo adyacente a este aliado.
languages.original_text: An ally under the effect of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

traits.locale_text: Los aliados bajo el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de la capacidad ¡Romped sus filas! del portador ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +1 a su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por cada enemigo adyacente a este aliado.

languages.text: Ein Verbündeter, der unter dem Effekt der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Durchbrich ihre Reihen! des Trägers steht, erlangt für jeden angrenzenden Feind einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ally under the effect of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

traits.locale_text: Ein Verbündeter, der unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} der Fähigkeit Durchbrich ihre Reihen! des Trägers steht, erlangt für jeden angrenzenden Feind einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.

languages.text: Союзник, на которого действует {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} персонажа Выход из окружения, получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждого противника на соседних клетках.
languages.original_text: An ally under the effect of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

traits.locale_text: Союзник, на которого действует способность персонажа Выход из окружения, получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждого противника на соседних клетках.

Союзник, на которого действует способность персонажа Выход из окружения, получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждого противника на соседних клетках.

languages.text: Un allié sous l'effet de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Percée offensive de l'utilisateur reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de +1 par ennemi adjacent à la position de cet allié.
languages.original_text: An ally under the effect of the wearer's Break Their Ranks! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

traits.locale_text: Un allié sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de la capacité Brisez leurs Rangs ! de l'utilisateur reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de +1 par ennemi adjacent à la position de cet allié.

languages.text: Takan kişinin Saflarını Yar! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} etkisi altında olan bir dost birim, o dost birimin bitişiğindeki her düşman için {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerine +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır.
